9 class Program(ABCTable):
10  _schema = """
11 id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
12 name TEXT,
13 description TEXT,
14 saved_at DATE,
15 has_blockly BOOLEAN
16 """
17  _default = [
18  ('Ned2_demo', 'Ned2_demo', 'A small demonstration program to show the Ned2 capabilities', False),
19  ('Ned3Pro_demo', 'Ned3Pro_demo', 'A small demonstration program to show the Ned3Pro capabilities', False),
20  ]
21 
22  def update(self, id_, values):
23  values['saved_at'] = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
24  return super().update(id_, values)
25 
26  def insert(self, id_, name, description, has_blockly):
27  self.check_not_exists(id_)
28 
29  saved_at = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
30  program = {
31  'id': id_, 'name': name, 'description': description, 'saved_at': saved_at, 'has_blockly': has_blockly
32  }
33 
34  query = ('INSERT INTO program (id, name, description, saved_at, has_blockly) '
35  'VALUES (:id, :name, :description, :saved_at, :has_blockly)')
36  self._dao.execute(query, program)
37  return program
